templates.name: Default
templates.description: This is a dark-themed HTML template designed for religious study content, featuring a clean and modern interface with a table of contents, collapsible study points, and branded footer sections. The template includes sections for scripture references, discussions, considerations, and conclusions, all structured within an expandable/collapsible format. The design incorporates responsive styling, smooth scrolling, and follows a consistent color scheme with dark backgrounds and light text for optimal readability.
